name: @d8a/ga4-duplicator
description: GA4 network request duplicator (browser inline script) - TypeScript source + minified dist build.

scripts.build:prod: mkdir -p dist && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && sed '/^export /d' ./dist/ga4-duplicator.js > ./dist/ga4-duplicator.tmp.js && mv ./dist/ga4-duplicator.tmp.js ./dist/ga4-duplicator.js && terser ./dist/ga4-duplicator.js --compress --mangle --output ./dist/ga4-duplicator.min.js && cp ./dist/ga4-duplicator.min.js ../../pkg/protocol/ga4/static/duplicator.js
